Title: Saiki Kusuo no Ψ-nan (ONA)
Description: ['Anime adaptation of the ', Saiki Kusuo no Ψ-nan, ' manga by Asou Shuichi, telling the story about a male high school student named Kusuo Saiki. He possesses supernatural powers that cause unfortunate events in his everyday life.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: ANN)']
